sentences.sContent: I thumbed a lift into town.
...and I was pretty fast with my thumb then...
...The ability to quickly thumb through pages is also lost...

synos.tran: 翻阅；以拇指拨弄；作搭车手势；笨拙地摆弄

phrases.pCn: n. 大拇指汤姆（英民间故事中只有拇指大的主人公）
指状储存器；拇指驱动器

trans.tranOther: to persuade a driver of a passing car to stop and take you somewhere, by putting your hand out with your thumb raised
the part of your hand that is shaped like a thick short finger and helps you to hold things
